perturbation.original_text: Then, the corresponding milestone payment shall be due within thirty (30) days of receipt by Ono of an invoice for payment and the taxation documents delivered from Array. Ono shall notify Array in writing within fifteen (15) Business Days after the achievement of each milestone set out in Section 6.2(b) by Ono, or any of its Affiliates
perturbation.changed_text: Then, the corresponding milestone payment shall be due within sixty (60) days of receipt by Ono of an invoice for payment and the taxation documents delivered from Array. Ono shall notify Array in writing within thirty (30) Business Days after the achievement of each milestone set out in Section 6.2(b) by Ono, or any of its Affiliates
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction by setting conflicting deadlines for payment of milestone payments and notification of milestone achievements. The original text states milestone payments are due within 'thirty (30) days' and notification of milestones within 'fifteen (15) Business Days'. The altered text changes this to 'sixty (60) days' for milestone payment and 'thirty (30) Business Days' for notifications, creating an inconsistency regarding the payment due date.

perturbation.original_text: Within forty five (45) days after the end of each calendar quarter, commencing with the calendar quarter in which the First Commercial Sale occurs, Ono shall deliver to Array a report (each, a "Royalty Report") setting out all details necessary to calculate the payments due under this Section 6.3, including:
perturbation.changed_text: Within thirty (30) days after the end of each calendar quarter, commencing with the calendar quarter in which the First Commercial Sale occurs, Ono shall deliver to Array a report (each, a "Royalty Report") setting out all details necessary to calculate the payments due under this Section 6.3, including:
perturbation.explanation: The original text states that the royalty reports are due within "forty five (45) days" after the end of each calendar quarter, while the changed text specifies "thirty (30) days." This creates an inconsistency in the agreed-upon deadline for delivering the royalty reports, which can lead to uncertainty and disputes regarding compliance.

perturbation.original_text: All payments under this Agreement shall be made by bank wire transfer in immediately available funds to an account designated by the Party to which such payments are due. Any payments or portions thereof due under this Agreement that are not paid by the date such payments are due under this Agreement shall bear interest at a rate equal Libor US Dollars one month with respect to payments in US Dollars, or the one month equivalent interbank offered rate with respect to payments in other currencies, plus in each case [ * ] per year, calculated on the number of days such payment is delinquent, compounded monthly and computed on the basis of a three hundred sixty five (365) day year.
perturbation.changed_text: All payments under this Agreement shall be made by bank wire transfer in immediately available funds to an account designated by the Party to which such payments are due. Any payments or portions thereof due under this Agreement that are not paid by the date such payments are due under this Agreement shall bear interest at a rate equal Libor US Dollars three month with respect to payments in US Dollars, or the one month equivalent interbank offered rate with respect to payments in other currencies, plus in each case [ * ] per year, calculated on the number of days such payment is delinquent, compounded quarterly and computed on the basis of a three hundred sixty (360) day year.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction by setting conflicting interest calculation on late payment. The original text states one month Libor and compounded monthly and basis of 365, The altered text changes this to three month Libor and compounded quarterly and basis of 360.
